title: The Wizard of No
creator_credit: J. Gary Mitchell, Jon Olinghouse and J Gary Mitchell Film Company
brief_description: Thirteen-year-old Billy is not the most popular boy in class. The Wizard of No suggests that his lack of popularity is directly related to his inability to say “no”. Points out that the word “no” has both a positive and a negative sense. Follows on with advertising and drug education segments.
